message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're on a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. This is the best price I can give you, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, which is as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer it to you for $105. This is the best price I can give you, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product, which is my final offer. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand you're trying to make a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $108. This is the best price I can give you, considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I understand you're trying to get the best price for the product, but I'm not willing to go above $98. I'm sticking to my previous offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're firm on your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $98. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $115. This is the best price I can give you, considering the product's value to me.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to pay more than $80. I'm making a final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
